verbs.description: Trump administration cutbacks [V: have] left some prisons short on correctional officers , requiring other workers to step in .
[ARG0: Trump administration cutbacks] have [V: left] [ARG1: some prisons] [ARG2: short on correctional officers] , [ARGM-ADV: requiring other workers to step in] .

Trump administration cutbacks have left some prisons short on correctional officers , requiring [ARG1: other workers] to [V: step] in .
